wikipedia_page.main: Michael Leopold Kilby (3 September 1924 – 9 September 2008) was a British Conservative politician who served as a Member of the European Parliament for the East Midlands between 1984 and 1989.Prior to his election as a Member of the European Parliament, he had served as the Mayor of Dunstable in 1963–64. A keen cricketer, he played minor counties cricket for Bedfordshire from 1950–55, making 21 appearances in the Minor Counties Championship. He died in September 2008 at Hawkhurst, Kent.
